messages.subject: Re: OT: Grab your EARS
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, I know this is completely off topic.....BUT While reading this post I just couldn t help but reach over my head and grab my ear!  Am I insane?  (be nice
messages.messageBody:
Ok, I know this is completely off topic.....BUT
While reading this post I just couldn't help but reach over my head and
grab
my ear! Am I insane? (be nice <g>)

Actually I find that when reading books I sorta act out some things, for

example if I read a passage that says "David scowled..." I may find
myself
making a scowling type face. Anyone else does this or notice this about

someone else?!?!?! Please tell me I am not alone!

Zan

Definitely not alone Zan - I did exactly the same thing! When I would
feed my babies, I was told that I opened my mouth wide and made the same
faces they were making. My husband says that sometimes he just watches
me while I read because he thinks it's hysterical.
Kate
So many faces to make, so little time
